name: The Nights at the Schoolhouse Mobile Port
name_original: The Nights at the Schoolhouse Mobile Port
description:
Warning! This game has loud sounds, jumpscares, flashling lights, and blood. Please play with caution.

You were hired to work the nightshift as a security guard at Baldi's schoolhouse. Nothing can go wrong, right?

Touch Screen:

Tap the light button to turn the lights on or off, tap the red camera button to open or close the camera. Tap on the blue buttons to change cameras. Tap and hold QUIT to quit the night.

Controller:

Press Y or click the light button to turn the lights on or off, press D-Pad Down or click the red camera button to open or close the camera. Press the left or right bumpers or click the blue buttons to switch camera. Press Select/View to quit the night.
